As Cindy got closer to her sister, she felt something was off but, did not know what until she was face to face with Becca.

“Wait,” Cindy say as she figure out what was wrong, “I thought you were shorter than me. When did you got as tall as me?” she ask.

Becca answer nervously, “Just now. Actually I am taller than you now,” as her head inch higher and higher, “I think I Am as tall as mom but, not for long,” Becca exclaimed as she was overjoyed at the new experience as she kept on getting taller until Cindy actually had to bent her head back just to look at her sister in the eye.

“H-h-h-ho-ho-how how...,” Cindy kept repeating.

“How tall am I?,” ask Becca, “well exactly 5’10”. So, this is how mom view me when she is looking at me. So cute,” she humor herself.
13431.title: Becca is growing
